ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Class envy (and race?)
ygData.messageBody:
Woooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooohooooooooo
ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo. I'm getting
one tonight.....




"Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> on 12/04/2000 19:38:58

Please respond to eqbards@egroups.com

To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Class envy (and race?)




Of note to all you fellow Wood Elves out there, the Hero Bracer is now Wood
Elf usable! Hurrah! Hurrah! If only I hadn't already sold mine...

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 1:35 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Class envy


At 02:24 PM 4/12/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Is there some logical reason why we don get to equip this item?
>
>Shield of Rainbow Hues: AC 18. +20 to all resistances. Classes: Mk, P,
>Ra, Ro, SK, Wr. Found in the plane of fear.
>
>Or should we petition to get included?


Why do Monks get a shield at all?! There's something very wrong here.

Talies
